author: WCAX News
title: 2 men arrested after Colchester drug investigation - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-
text:
COLCHESTER, Vt. - On Thursday, Vermont State Police arrested Michael Burton, 40, and Timothy Barfield from Philadelphia after an investigation into the sale of heroin and crack cocaine in Colchester
Police say they found approximately 130 bags of heroin and 16 grams of crack cocaine worth more than $8,000 at a hotel Burton and Barfield were staying at.
Burton and Barfield will be arraigned felony drug charges Friday in Burlington.
